action.action-desc: Mr. Tony Gonzales of Texas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to prevent the use of explosive materials to assault, resist, or impede certain officers or employees.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Curbing Offenses on Policing Services Act or the COPS Act.

section.header: Assaulting, resisting, or impeding certain officers or employees
section.text: Section 111 of title 18, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking under this title and inserting up to $200,000;
by striking one year and inserting two years; and
by striking 8 years and inserting 10 years; and
by inserting after including the following: explosive materials, as defined in section 841, or;
by striking shall be fined under this title and inserting shall be fined up to $500,000, notwithstanding section 3571,; and
by striking 20 years and inserting 25 years.
